mainContent: WestWater Engineering has provided engineering services for the Orchard Mesa Sanitation District for the past 20 years and has provided design and construction specifications for new sewer line extensions within the District.

WestWater Engineering has also completed a preliminary engineering study to identify requirements for sewer line extensions to serve 2,600 acres east of the present District boundaries, including flow routing and identification of constraints that could otherwise result in inefficient grade and pipe sizes, or may require sewage lift stations.
We have also reviewed and provided construction inspection for new sewer line extensions associated with new developments within the District.
